TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed DataGrid/HitTestType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the part of the control the user has clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration to determine which part of the grid has been clicked. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType>. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> is created by invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>. The row, column, and part of the grid are then printed.
[!code-cpp[Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DataGrid.HitTestType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType Caption = int32(32)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType Cell = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType ColumnHeader = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A column header in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType ColumnResize = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The column border, which is the line between column headers. It can be dragged to resize a column's width.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The background area, visible when the control contains no table, few rows, or when a table is scrolled to its bottom.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType ParentRows = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The parent row section of the control. The parent row displays information from or about the parent table of the currently displayed child table, such as the name of the parent table, column names and values of the parent record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType RowHeader = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A row header in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid/HitTestType RowResize = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The row border, which is the line between grid row headers. It can be dragged to resize a row's height.
